Nice story ngl

@Bulbul310 Your post explains what I kept trying to say all this time perfectly. Had these sex scenes have proper build up and meaning to them instead "oops, just got an urges to do it", then this is almost a peak fiction. Fuuga should've grown some spine and asked his editor this would rather be published as a normal manga instead. It could've been fantastic if the only sex scene here is when Rei & Mei closed the bathroom door, Masato broke down after telling Aki his big bro is the killer and they finally started having sex. Rei knows what Mei is actually thinking about Masato all these years so can do nothing but holding her trembling hand. Then after things finished, Mei realized her feelings but Rei just kissed her forehead and says "we have deeper bonds than this, and we have all the time in the world.", hinting they might become a couple in the future. Ending comes. Credits rolls. Argghhhh so many lost opportunities for a scripts. Why Fuuga why.

I must say it was pretty weird, it felt like porn with actual plot which is so weird to me. Tbh if this was an actual manga and the sex wasn't in it then it would've been better imo as the writer clearly wanted to make a story that goes beyond incest sex.

Overall a good doujin but the fact the sex was so random with little build up was kinda of a turn off for me, especially since I was so invested in the plot. Overall I give it a 7/10
What a trip
I just hope we get a sequel even just for the ending on whether Mei and Rei's relationship continue/progress or end.
I was looking for incest shit but i found gem.

Let me just say up to page 144 it does have a good plot and stort and good and good H scenese too if you're into incest that is and and anyone saying the H scene gets in the way of the story or vice versa this is not a full blown doujin this is a smut manga

I... I clicked faster to get through the sex because I wanted to know where the plot was going...  I don't even know how long I've been reading... it was so engrossing.
The fuck... This shit is gold wtf
@A-san Oh yeah, it no doubt is. I just don't find chickening out a this point any rational. The worse is behind, and "going back to normality" will actually hurt more. Why bother?

Anyway, in real life, social acceptance is 100% no joke in Japan and that's why a fiction about immoral relationship like this is so popular : because you can escaping reality in a brief moment by reading them. In 2022, first it was the pope listening to Megalovania. Then it's me having a serious discussion about the plot in porn manga on porn site. Never thought I'd ever did that lol.

BTW, I took a look at the supposed prequel, and while I don't understand japanese characters, it seems like Tetsuya (?) was not mentally healthy and never properly grew into an adult. He also appears to have had a massive oedipus complex towards his older sister, but I may be wrong. His nephew, on the other hand, was always precocious and rather mature, and his niece soon followed her brother's steps once their parents died, probably to keep their family together. At this point, they were already a pair, but not romantically. However, since they were not conditionated to feel repulse in the intimacy of the other and both grew into physically attractive teenagers, their desire to stay together eventually came to include sexual deeds.
woah, wtf, im just joking when im saying i watch porn for the story...
God the Sister is a Bitch and a half.

@A-san People go different ways for a lot of reasons unrelated to "running from taboos", and yes, the aftermath of a breakup is one of the main reasons why incest tends to be bad for family relationships. It probably hurts like hell. However, since their affair has survived the proof of time, what exactly is different now so it can't continue? So, yes, there is no telling that they will stay wanting a relationship in the future (although I could see some high level commitment here that usually results in life-long pairings), but "oh no, taboo makes me sad" as reason for parting ways should already be behind where they are (like, they even confirmed that they were serious by talking it to the other) and is definitely odd. In other words, as I see it, the "bittersweet" ending you enjoyed is more adequate to a scenario of nubile crush / plain sexual curiosity and not a full blown mutual romantic deal.
Fucking great story, didn't even fapped since i focused on the story so much

@TorakWolf Maybe it's a stupid trope. But I found "then reality kicks in" kind of ending in this is so beautiful. Rei & Mei love each other so much but they also know things are starting to change soon (like their relationships & Masato). And the worst to happen to them is not shunning. It's them finally realizing they can't stay together forever and need go separated ways like their mom & uncle. Sure, they survived serial killers, everyone close to them may turned blind eye (for now), but they have yet to face the most powerful obstacle of all : Time itself. No matter how much you think you love each other, "time" will separated you from what you love most one day. All "this" is but a turning point and the siblings know that more will come soon. Hence such bittersweet ending. Maybe one day in the future, their taboo relationships right now will be nothing but small secrets that made them sighed "oh how could I..." and that's it - but how this ends is up to you BTW.

I really enjoyed this, although the whole serial killer deal was unecessary and tasteless. Also,while the sex scenes were good, I would rather see some rough deep creampie action happening over this porn-esque shallow cum shooting. 9/10.

@A-san It's a kinda stupid trope, honestly. Pretty much everybody around them already knows about their relationship and decided to turn a blind eye. It would be a much better end to just have them confused and afraid but willing to attempt staying together, specially after everything that happened. What would be the worst to happen? Shunning? They had a murderous uncle and aunt duo trying to end their existences and managed to survive and uncover them. They have more than enough skills to do whatever the fuck they want with their lives.

amazing in every fucking way
Jesus what the fuck. I started with the intention to fap, and wound up going limp and just reading to the end while quickly glossing over the sex scenes. 10/10

Also, I love to think that Fuuga's works are connected and Rei & Mei mother and uncle are the siblings from one of his previous work called Ane no Himitsu to Yuurei or something (the one with Mieruko-kun & this sus girl & his sus sis). Seeing how lookalike they are and he's her little bro too, it fits in my headcanon pretty well despite anything else.

@KenGotTheLexGs I know. Rei and Mei might be blood siblings after all because one of Fuuga's main tropes is incest, yet he is known to make a hint here and there to make us interpret his works. The point of their final sex scene & dialogues with their uncle is that despite how much they love each other, they know full well their relationships will not last. The dialogue with uncle made us suspicious their mother and uncle may be the same too and there are more secrets in the family. These scenes tell us that nothing is certain. One day the siblings will need to go separated ways and have their own life like their mom & uncle (or them & Masato). Hence why the few last page is like "We know, but just a little more...".

To those who want spoilers, I just finished it. This was a happy ending, but its not confirmed if they're really siblings or not. I bet they weren't tho. Anyway, enjoy the story. Also, the plot is good, you thought it was him, but its actually not.
I think removing hhh scenes will make this a good manga!!! The story is pretty damn interesting 100000/10

Came here for the fap, stayed for the plot. Its more like smut manga than hentai. Writing was pretty good and the story turned out well with a nice ending. Refreshing to see stuff like this one on here. Might have to give the author's other works a read.
id say its good but like author its supposed to be a hentai im not saying its not good its just more so a story and not a hentai

My dick did go up several times as I read this, but I was so engrossed in the plot that I need not fap. Incredible story telling, better than average mangakas. The ability to incorporate sex within the plot is something very rare in this industry. Fuuga is a gifted ero writer and I shall be binging his works for plot, rather than “plot”.

And if you enjoy this series, please considered supporting Fuuga by buying licensed copy. You can go to digital download site like DMM or DLSite and type "ふしだらな兄妹". Or you can buy hard copy from a place like A*az** jp, if you can find a seller who's willing to ship it. Fuuga needs all the support he can get.

Good story. Bad hentai. Thanks for translating it so non-JP readers can read Fuuga's work, KenGotTheLexGs. Anyway, if anyone is puzzled by the ending, I think it was hinted that Rei and Mei's mother and her brother may have had sexual relationship in the past too (as he smiles looking at them holding hands and how much she cared about him). And to think there's no actual confirmation Re and Mei are actual blood siblings...Well... They also started to realize their current "relationship" will not last, but they chose to live the present to the fullest anyway. One day they may ended up like their mother & uncle. At some point, Masato and Aki may break up and Rei can finally get what she wants from the start. Who knows. I guess Fuuga need to polished his skills at telling stories and start his own non-H manga series one day. You can tell how much this series was held back by its hentai shell instead being actual manga. 8/10 for me. Not as good as "Teacher and Student", but good read.
